powers.title: Reckless Attack
powers.description: Attack without concern for your life - deals double damage but makes you vulnerable to a counterattack.

powers.title: Parry
powers.description: Deflect melee attack from an equally skilled opponent.

powers.title: Knock Down
powers.description: You charge in a straight line towards the selected enemy and smash into them. The enemy gets knocked down, losing their next turn.
